title: Hardy Heating Co.Ltd.: the accountant - the information manager
brief_description: SUMMARY: Introduction by Graham Turner. Looks at the role of the accountant in a relatively small company where he has to be both financial and management accountant. The aim of the program is to show the role and the managerial position of an accountant
